text:
We’ve had a wonderful experience with Smart Berriis @ WestCoast! The teachers are caring and attentive, and the curriculum balances learning and play perfectly. The environment is clean, safe, and welcoming. Our child has grown in confidence and social skills since joining. Highly recommend this center to any parent!

Thank you, Smart Berriis team, for your dedication and care!

Our youngest son joined the playgroup class in August 2024, and we could not be happier with his experience. Mrs. Fong, in particular, has been excellent. Her warmth and genuine love for children, and her extensive experience puts us completely at ease. We are also grateful for Ms. Elizabeth, who is also very caring and dedicated. As an educator myself, I deeply value their sacrifice, the long hours they put in, and the smiles they bring into the classroom. We are so thankful to have them guiding our youngest as he takes his first step in learning.

My daughter has a very very happy time in Smart berriis@West coast. She stays here for one year, half a year in N2 and the other half year in K1. She loves the teachers in N2 and K1 very very much. Thank Smart Berriis@West coast for giving her so much great time and so beautiful memory here.

I highly appreciate the concern the teachers and staff are giving to my son. I know that when I leave him at school, he is well taken care of and he is also enjoying. He is continuously learning a lot everyday and he’s growing a lot more independently and confidently.
My son has been at this school for 1.5 years now, and he's happy to go every day. The teachers are super dedicated, and thanks to them, he's really picked up discipline and independence.
